titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 80 percent limitation on the amount of business meal and entertainment expenses which are deductible.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 80 percent limitation on the amount of business meal and entertainment expenses which are tax deductible.
